description:
When a criminal gang threatens a young girl he loves, Yahiko seeks Kenshin`s advice on how to defend her in a lopsided fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Genç Bir Kılıç Ustasının Doğuşu: İlk Çırak Yahiko`nun Savaşı
Shounen Kenshi Tanjou! Ichiban Deshi Yahiko no Tatakai
The Birth of a Boy Swordsman
การต่อสู้ของศิษย์คนแรก
少年剣士誕生! 一番弟子弥彦の戦い
